author: Special Correspondent
text:
‘ Olam’ , a short film, creating awareness about the ill-effects of alcoholism and drug abuse, has been winning accolades at several film festivals. Besides getting the jury award for cinematography and actors at some festivals, it has qualified for ‘official selection’ at many festivals.

This 31-minute film directed by Suresh Vijay, will be screened in Chennai on Sunday.
title: Short film wins accolades
